title: Mini-Ep 244: Fall Back
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 244: Fall Back
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree slip into sweaters, light apple-scented candles, and get into the Fall Feeling. Then, listeners write in about Nair for down there, great mascara recs, and advice for a single 30-something thinking ahead. Plus, Kate and Doree turn out to...
description:
Kate and Doree slip into sweaters, light apple-scented candles, and get into the Fall Feeling. Then, listeners write in about Nair for down there, great mascara recs, and advice for a single 30-something thinking ahead. Plus, Kate and Doree turn out to be dog-adopting experts!


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
